parameters.name: User
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
and isnotempty(SourceUserName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SourceUserName
| project SourceUserName
| sort by SourceUserName asc

parameters.name: Asset
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS" and isnotempty(DeviceName)
| distinct DeviceName
| sort by DeviceName desc

parameters.name: Location
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where isnotempty(InfobloxB1Region) 
| distinct Location = InfobloxB1Region
| sort by Location asc

parameters.name: SLD
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS" and isnotempty(DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend DestinationDnsDomain = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| distinct SecondLevelDomain

parameters.name: ResponseCode
parameters.label: Response Code
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSRCode:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where isnotempty(InfobloxDNSRCode)
| distinct InfobloxDNSRCode
| sort by InfobloxDNSRCode asc

parameters.name: RecordType
parameters.label: Record Type
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where isnotempty(InfobloxDNSQType)
| distinct InfobloxDNSQType
| sort by InfobloxDNSQType asc

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{User:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and ('{RecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and ('{ResponseCode:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and ('{Asset:escapejson}' == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and ('{Location:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1Region in~ ({Location}))
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where ('{SLD:escapejson}' == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationDnsDomain
| project DestinationDnsDomain, Count
| sort by Count desc

parameters.name: TopDevices
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS" and DestinationDnsDomain == ('{DestinationDnsDomain}') and isnotempty(DeviceName)
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{User:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and ('{RecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and ('{ResponseCode:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and ('{Asset:escapejson}' == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and ('{Location:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1Region in~ ({Location}))
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceName
| top 10 by Count desc
| summarize DeviceList = make_list(DeviceName)

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS" and DeviceName == ('{FirstDevice}') and DestinationDnsDomain == ('{DestinationDnsDomain}')
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{User:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and ('{RecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and ('{ResponseCode:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and ('{Asset:escapejson}' == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and ('{Location:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1Region in~ ({Location}))
| summarize Count = count() by SourceIP
| render piechart with(title=tostring(todynamic('{TopDevices}')[0]))
content.title: Device : {FirstDevice} , MAC : {FirstMAC}

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS" and SourceUserName == ('{SourceUserName}')
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string, InfobloxDNSView:string, InfobloxDNSQClass:string, InfobloxDNSQFlags:string, InfobloxAnCount:string, InfobloxNsCount:string, InfobloxArCount:string, InfobloxB1ConnectionType:string, InfobloxB1OPHName:string, InfobloxB1OPHIPAddress:string, InfobloxB1Network:string, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion:string, InfobloxB1DHCPFingerprint:string, InfobloxB1DNSTags:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{RecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and ('{ResponseCode:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and ('{Asset:escapejson}' == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and ('{Location:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1Region in~ ({Location}))
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where ('{SLD:escapejson}' == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
| project TimeGenerated, DestinationDnsDomain, DeviceName, DeviceAddress, SourceIP, SourcePort, Activity, LogSeverity, Protocol, AdditionalExtensions, DeviceEventClassID, ApplicationProtocol, InfobloxDNSQType, InfobloxDNSRCode, InfobloxB1Region, InfobloxDNSView, InfobloxDNSQClass, InfobloxDNSQFlags, InfobloxAnCount, InfobloxNsCount, InfobloxArCount, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1OPHName, InfobloxB1OPHIPAddress, InfobloxB1Network, InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion, InfobloxB1DHCPFingerprint, InfobloxB1DNSTags
content.title: DNS Requests made by User : {SourceUserName}

content.query:
let Gridtimestring = tostring('{QPS_Time}');
let Gridtime = todatetime(substring(Gridtimestring, indexof(Gridtimestring, " "), indexof(Gridtimestring, "GMT") - 1 - indexof(Gridtimestring, " "))) -5h - 30m;

CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS" 
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{User:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and ('{RecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and ('{ResponseCode:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and ('{Asset:escapejson}' == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and ('{Location:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1Region in~ ({Location}))
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where ('{SLD:escapejson}' == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
| where TimeGenerated between (Gridtime - 30m .. Gridtime + 30m)
//| project Gridtimestring, Gridtime, TimeGenerated
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
//| project TimeGenerated
| make-series Count = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1m) from (Gridtime - 30m) to (Gridtime + 30m) step 1m by InfobloxDNSRCode
content.title: Overall Queries Per Minute

content.query:
let Gridtimestring = tostring('{QPS_Time}');
let Gridtime = todatetime(substring(Gridtimestring, indexof(Gridtimestring, " "), indexof(Gridtimestring, "GMT") - 1 - indexof(Gridtimestring, " "))) -5h - 30m;

CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{User:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and ('{RecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and ('{ResponseCode:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and ('{Asset:escapejson}' == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and ('{Location:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1Region in~ ({Location}))
and TimeGenerated between ((Gridtime - 30m) .. (Gridtime + 30m))
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where ('{SLD:escapejson}' == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceName
content.title: Overall Query by Devices per hour

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{User:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and ('{RecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and ('{ResponseCode:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and ('{Asset:escapejson}' == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and ('{Location:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1Region in~ ({Location}))
and InfobloxDNSRCode == ('{Response_Type}')
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where ('{SLD:escapejson}' == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
| project TimeGenerated, DestinationDnsDomain, DeviceAddress, DeviceName, SourceIP, SourcePort, Activity, LogSeverity, Protocol, AdditionalExtensions, DeviceEventClassID, ApplicationProtocol
content.title: {Response_Type} DNS Requests

content.query:
let Gridtimestring = tostring('{Time_Location}');
let Gridtime = todatetime(substring(Gridtimestring, indexof(Gridtimestring, " "), indexof(Gridtimestring, "GMT") - 1 - indexof(Gridtimestring, " "))) -5h - 30m;

CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS" 
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxDNSRCode:string, InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{User:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User}))
and ('{RecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({RecordType}))
and ('{ResponseCode:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSRCode in~ ({ResponseCode}))
and ('{Asset:escapejson}' == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset}))
and InfobloxB1Region == ('{QPS_Location}')
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where ('{SLD:escapejson}' == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
//| project Gridtimestring, Gridtime, TimeGenerated
| where TimeGenerated between (Gridtime - 30m .. Gridtime + 30m)
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
//| project TimeGenerated
| make-series Count = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1m) from (Gridtime - 30m) to (Gridtime + 30m) step 1m by InfobloxDNSRCode
content.title: Queries Per Location : {QPS_Location} Per Minute

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "Audit" and DeviceAction == ('{bar_Action}')
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxHostID: string, InfobloxIPSpace: string, InfobloxSubnet: string, InfobloxHTTPReqBody: string, InfobloxResourceId: string, InfobloxResourceType: string, InfobloxHTTPRespBody: string, id: string, name: string, pool_id: string, service_type: string, InfobloxSubjectGroups: string, InfobloxRangeStart: string, InfobloxRangeEnd: string, InfobloxLeaseOp: string, InfobloxClientID: string, InfobloxDUID: string, InfobloxLifetime: string, InfobloxLeaseUUID: string, InfobloxFingerprintPr: string, InfobloxFingerprint: string ) with ( kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")
| where ('{UserName:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({UserName})) 
| project-rename User = SourceUserName, Action = DeviceAction
| project TimeGenerated, User, Action, SourceIP, LogSeverity, Computer, Message, Activity, InfobloxHostID, InfobloxIPSpace, InfobloxSubnet, InfobloxHTTPReqBody, InfobloxResourceId, InfobloxResourceType, InfobloxHTTPRespBody, id, name, pool_id, service_type, InfobloxSubjectGroups, InfobloxRangeStart, InfobloxRangeEnd, InfobloxLeaseOp, InfobloxClientID, InfobloxDUID, InfobloxLifetime, InfobloxLeaseUUID, InfobloxFingerprintPr, InfobloxFingerprint, ApplicationProtocol, CollectorHostName
content.title: Audit Logs for Action : {bar_Action}

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "Audit" and DeviceAction == ('{bar_Action}')

CommonSecurityLog

| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxHostID: string, InfobloxIPSpace: string, InfobloxSubnet: string, InfobloxHTTPReqBody: string, InfobloxResourceId: string, InfobloxResourceType: string, InfobloxHTTPRespBody: string, id: string, name: string, pool_id: string, service_type: string, InfobloxSubjectGroups: string, InfobloxRangeStart: string, InfobloxRangeEnd: string, InfobloxLeaseOp: string, InfobloxClientID: string, InfobloxDUID: string, InfobloxLifetime: string, InfobloxLeaseUUID: string, InfobloxFingerprintPr: string, InfobloxFingerprint: string ) with ( kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")

parameters.name: User
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
and isnotempty(SourceUserName)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by SourceUserName
| project SourceUserName
| sort by SourceUserName asc

parameters.name: Asset
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ" and isnotempty(DeviceName)
| distinct DeviceName
| sort by DeviceName desc

parameters.name: Location
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxB1Region:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where isnotempty(InfobloxB1Region) 
| distinct Location = InfobloxB1Region
| sort by Location asc

parameters.name: FQDN
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ" and isnotempty(DestinationDnsDomain)
| distinct DestinationDnsDomain
| sort by DestinationDnsDomain asc

parameters.name: SLD
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS" and isnotempty(DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend DestinationDnsDomain = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| distinct SecondLevelDomain

parameters.name: DNSRecordType
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox" and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector" and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "DNS"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where isnotempty(InfobloxDNSQType)
| distinct InfobloxDNSQType
| order by InfobloxDNSQType asc
parameters.label: DNS Record Type

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.label: Policy Name
parameters.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox"
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxB1PolicyName: string) with ( kv_delimiter="=", pair_delimiter=";")
| where isnotempty(InfobloxB1PolicyName)
| distinct InfobloxB1PolicyName
| sort by InfobloxB1PolicyName asc

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox"
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
    and isnotempty(SourceUserName)
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxB1Region:string, InfobloxB1PolicyAction: string, InfobloxB1PolicyName: string) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{User:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User})) and ('{DNSRecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({DNSRecordType})) and ('{Asset:escapejson}' == "*" or DeviceName in~ ({Asset})) and ('{Location:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1Region in~ ({Location})) and ('{FQDN:escapejson}' == "*" or DestinationDnsDomain in~ ({FQDN})) and ('{PolicyName:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1PolicyName in~ ({PolicyName}))
| where InfobloxB1PolicyAction == "Block"
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where ('{SLD:escapejson}' == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
| summarize Count  = count() by User = SourceUserName
| top 10 by Count
content.title: Top 10 Compromised Users

content.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "Infoblox"
    and DeviceProduct == "Data Connector"
    and DeviceEventClassID has_cs "RPZ"
    and DeviceName == ('{DeviceName}')
| parse-kv AdditionalExtensions as (InfobloxDNSQType:string, InfobloxB1Region:string, InfobloxB1PolicyAction: string, InfobloxB1PolicyName: string, InfobloxRPZRule: string, InfobloxPolicyID: string, InfobloxDomainCat: string, InfobloxB1ConnectionType: string, InfobloxB1Network: string,InfobloxB1SrcOSVersion: string, InfobloxB1DNSTags:string, InfobloxB1ThreatIndicator: string, InfobloxB1FeedType: string ) with (pair_delimiter=';', kv_delimiter='=')
| where ('{User:escapejson}' == "*" or SourceUserName in~ ({User})) and ('{DNSRecordType:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxDNSQType in~ ({DNSRecordType})) and ('{Location:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1Region in~ ({Location})) and ('{FQDN:escapejson}' == "*" or DestinationDnsDomain in~ ({FQDN})) and ('{PolicyName:escapejson}' == "*" or InfobloxB1PolicyName in~ ({PolicyName}))
| where InfobloxB1PolicyAction == "Block"
| extend DestinationDnsDomain_ = trim_end(@'.',DestinationDnsDomain)
| extend domains = split(DestinationDnsDomain_,'.')
| extend SecondLevelDomain =strcat(domains[-2],'.',domains[-1])
| where ('{SLD:escapejson}' == "*" or SecondLevelDomain in~ ({SLD}))
| project-rename User = SourceUserName, Asset = DeviceName
| project TimeGenerated, Asset, SourceIP, User, LogSeverity, Activity, Computer, CollectorHostName, ApplicationProtocol, InfobloxRPZRule, InfobloxB1PolicyName, InfobloxB1PolicyAction, InfobloxPolicyID, InfobloxB1Region, InfobloxB1ConnectionType, InfobloxB1DNSTags, InfobloxB1ThreatIndicator, InfobloxB1FeedType
